summary: The Illegal Red Snapper and Tuna Enforcement Act aims to combat illegal fishing. It mandates the Under Secretary of Commerce for Standards and Technology and the NOAA Administrator to create a standard methodology, based on chemical analysis, to identify the country of origin of red snapper and tuna. It also authorizes the Secretary of Defense, in coordination with the Coast Guard, to provide maritime technical assistance to other nations to fight illegal fishing and transnational crime.
